metadata.title: CVE-2014-6028 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: TorrentFlux 2.4 allows remote authenticated users to obtain other users'cookies via the cid parameter in an editCookies action to profile.php.

criterions.comment: torrentflux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
